t: Amazon plans clothing store for Americana mall in Glendale - Los Angeles Times
s: January 20, 2022 - It’s the latest brick-and-mortar entry for Amazon, which already sells more than 10% of all clothes in the U.S. The store, which will sell women’s and men’s clothing as well as shoes and other accessories, will open at the Americana at Brand mall in Glendale.

t: Gap Falls into Amazon with Brand ‘Store’ and New Baby Gear Line - Retail TouchPoints
s: November 11, 2022 - Gap, one of America’s most storied mall-based brands, is opening up shop on what has essentially become the country’s biggest mall — Amazon.
